headline: Kornit Digital Appoints Andrew G. Backman Chief Capital Markets Officer
summary: ROSH HA’AYIN, Israel and ENGLEWOOD. N.J., Jan. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kornit Digital Ltd. (“Kornit” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: KRNT), a worldwide market leader in sustainable, on-demand digital fashion and textile production technologies, today announced the appointment of Andrew G. Backman as Chief Capital Markets Officer, effective January 13, 2026. In this role, Mr. Backman will support Kornit’s capital markets activities, investor relations, and corporate and business development initi
